rules_text:
Tap all creatures target opponent controls. If this spell wasn't awakened, distribute up to two stun counters among nonland creatures tapped this way.
Awaken 3–{3}{U}{R}{W} [i](If you cast this spell for {3}{U}{R}{W}, also put three +1/+1 counters on target land you control and it becomes a 0/0 Elemental creature with haste. It's still a land.)[/i]
notes:
Needs_Art

Rank_3
Reason: I think we can just always distribute the stun counters.
